name: Clock Tower

name: Serpentine in Kotor

name: Hard Rock Cafe
description: {'Info': ['Hard Rock Cafe Podgorica, established on February 8, 2015, is the first of its kind in the Adriatic region.', 'Located at Independence Square in the heart of Podgorica, Montenegro, it offers a blend of American cuisine and local favorites in a music-infused atmosphere.'], 'Restaurant Features': ['Ambiance: Laid-back setting adorned with music memorabilia, providing both indoor and outdoor seating.', 'Services: Free Wi-Fi, live music events, and a Rock Shop offering branded merchandise.'], 'Main Dishes': ['Signature Items: Legendary® Burger, slow-roasted wings, and a variety of handcrafted cocktails.', 'Local Flavors: Dishes incorporating Montenegrin culinary influences.'], 'Working Hours': ['Open daily from 8:00 AM to 12:00 AM.']}
short_description: Iconic cafe in Podgorica blending American cuisine with local flavors in a vibrant, music-themed setting.

name: Niagara Restaurant
description: {'Info': ["Restoran Niagara is located on the banks of the Cijevna River near the Niagara Waterfall, offering a unique dining experience in a tranquil natural setting away from the city's hustle."], 'Restaurant Features': ['Scenic Location: Overlooks the waterfall and river, providing a relaxing atmosphere.', 'Ambience: Cozy interior with an outdoor terrace for enjoying the picturesque surroundings.', 'Services: Free Wi-Fi, parking, and private event spaces available.'], 'Main Dishes': ['Local Specialties: Kačamak (potato, cheese, and cream dish), Cicvara (soft cheese with cream), and Podgorica Popeci (stuffed veal rolls with cheese and bacon).', 'Grilled Meats: Slow-cooked lamb and veal under the bell ("Ispod Sača").', 'Seafood: trout ("trout"), carp ("carp"), and grilled squid ("squid").'], 'Working Hours': ['Summer: 7:00 AM – Midnight', 'Winter: 8:00 AM – 11:00 PM']}
short_description: A riverside restaurant near Niagara Waterfall, serving traditional Montenegrin cuisine in a serene setting.
